DELETE /zones/{zone_identifier}/firewall.description: Deletes an existing Zone Lockdown rule.

schema.description: The unique identifier of the Zone Lockdown rule.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Zone Lockdown rule.

200.description: Delete a Zone Lockdown rule response

id.description: The unique identifier of the Zone Lockdown rule.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

4XX.description: Delete a Zone Lockdown rule response failure

GET /zones/{zone_identifier}/firewall/lo.description: Fetches Zone Lockdown rules. You can filter the results using several optional parameters.

allOf.description: A string to search for in the description of existing rules.
The timestamp of when the rule was last modified.
A single IP address to search for in existing rules.

The priority of the rule to control the processing order. A lower number indicates higher priority. If not provided, any rules with a configured priority will be processed before rules without a priority.
A single URI to search for in the list of URLs of existing rules.
A single IP address range to search for in existing rules.

schema.description: The maximum number of results per page. You can only set the value to `1` or to a multiple of 5 such as `5`, `10`, `15`, or `20`.
The timestamp of when the rule was created.
A string to search for in the description of existing rules.
A single IP address to search for in existing rules.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip_range` when specifying an IP address range in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

configurations.description: A list of IP addresses or CIDR ranges that will be allowed to access the URLs specified in the Zone Lockdown rule. You can include any number of `ip` or `ip_range` configurations.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip` when specifying an IP address in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address to match. This address will be compared to the IP address of incoming requests.

target.description: The configuration target. You must set the target to `ip_range` when specifying an IP address range in the Zone Lockdown rule.

value.description: The IP address range to match. You can only use prefix lengths `/16` and `/24`.

created_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was created.

description.description: An informative summary of the rule.
description.example: Restrict access to these endpoints to requests from a known IP address

id.description: The unique identifier of the Zone Lockdown rule.

modified_on.description: The timestamp of when the rule was last modified.

paused.description: When true, indicates that the rule is currently paused.

urls.description: The URLs to include in the rule definition. You can use wildcards. Each entered URL will be escaped before use, which means you can only use simple wildcard patterns.
